titles.title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park Boundary Extension Act of 2004
To extend the boundary of the Hawai`i Volcanoes National Park in the State of Hawaii.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 10/4/2004--Introduced. Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park Boundary Extension Act of 2004 - Extends the boundary of the Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park in the State of Hawaii.
